title: Synchronice
author: Synchronice
content: Hello guys, I and my business partner want to purchase peeled peanuts from India in bulk to manufacture peanut butter. India is the largest exporter of peanuts, so I think there will be some guys on this forum who may own peanut company or are in touch with people who are into this business. We may purchase up to 1 metric ton at first. If everything will happen remotely, (buy, load ship, receive) we can use an escrow from this forum.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Quote from: Synchronice on August 18, 2023, 10:46:48 AMHello guys, I and my business partner want to purchase peeled peanuts from India in bulk to manufacture peanut butter. India is the largest exporter of peanuts, so I think there will be some guys on this forum who may own peanut company or are in touch with people who are into this business. We may purchase up to 1 metric ton at first. If everything will happen remotely, (buy, load ship, receive) we can use an escrow from this forum.I am not sure whether you will find anyone here dealing with actual peeled peanuts. As per my understanding, this is not the place to find someone dealing in agri-based products. You can check this website for more information about your requirements. You can check https://www.indiamart.com/ and find out other payment options. I might be wrong, let's see if anyone here can help you which I doubt.
